good one man

How I play a 3D movie:

1. Put 3D movie onto USB stick. (convert from MKV to AVI if necessary)
2. Plug USB into LG 3D TV.
3. Navigate through the file system to the movie and select PLAY
4. Press 3D button on remote and select SBS.
5. Select ENTER and put on LG passive glasses. (the ones from a theater movie work too)

Your TV may be different.
